page.title: 13FOOD FOR A DAY
page.content: {Breakfast: Fruit juice,cereals and milk, toast and marmalade, tea or coffee. {Lunch: Quiche and granary bread with salad, tea or coffee,cake or fruit. {Dinner: Roast chicken, stuffing, peas, carrots, roast potatoes and gravy. Lemon meringue pie and cream. { {Supper: Crisps, sandwiches, cocoa. {Costs:}Teabags(80) ............Â£1.20 Coffee(100g)............Â£1.34 Milk(pint)..............Â£0.22 Bread...................Â£0.45 Cornflakes..............Â£0.90 Cheese(lb.).............Â£1.25 Chicken(4lb.)...........Â£2.80 Wine(bot.)..............Â£1.90 Eggs(doz. large)........Â£1.12 Crisps(small pkt.)......Â£0.12
